We use colors daily in frontend development.  
Yet we rarely analyze the structural differences between HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSLA.

Visually identical.  
Structurally distinct.

The decision is architectural.

## Conclusion

HEX is compact.  
RGB is mathematical.  
HSL is perceptual.  
HSLA adds flexibility.

The real difference is not visual.  
It is structural.

Choosing intentionally improves system consistency.
